overview: The 2007 production by Paperhand Puppet Intervention performed in The Forest Theater. Running Time: 1 hour, 22 minutes  Act 1: The Boat We're In Act 2: The Life of a Shoe Act 3: The Fragrant Weeds of Unimportance Act 4: The Opposite of Violence Act 5: The Song of the Ordinary
title: A Shoe For Your Foot
